org.openimaj.image.processing.face.alignment

Interface FaceAligner<T extends DetectedFace>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of DetectedFace
    All Superinterfaces:
    ReadableBinary, ReadWriteableBinary, WriteableBinary
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineAligner, CLMAligner, IdentityAligner, MeshWarpAligner, RotateScaleAligner, ScalingAligner

    public interface FaceAligner<T extends DetectedFace>
extends ReadWriteableBinary
    A FaceAligner produces aligned face patches (i.e. with the eyes aligned or more). These can be used for building features for recognition, etc.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FImage align(T face)
      For the provided face detection, return an aligned version of the face.
      FImage getMask()
      Return a mask image for aligned faces.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openimaj.io.ReadableBinary

        binaryHeader, readBinary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openimaj.io.WriteableBinary

        binaryHeader, writeBinary

    • Method Detail

      • align

        FImage align(T face)
        For the provided face detection, return an aligned version of the face.
        Parameters:
        face - the face to align
        Returns:
        aligned face

      • getMask

        FImage getMask()
        Return a mask image for aligned faces. 0 pixels mark background pixels that should be ignored in further processing of aligned faces produced by this aligner.
        Returns:
        a mask image, or null if masking isn't required
